ayah: الٓمٓ
ayah_translit: alif-lam-meem
ayah_english: Alif Lam Mim

ayah: تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ
ayah_translit: til'ka ayatu al-kitabi al-hakimi
ayah_english: These (are) Verses (of) the Book the Wise

ayah: هُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٗ لِّلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
ayah_translit: hudan warahmatan lil'muh'sinina
ayah_english: A guidance and a mercy for the good-doers

ayah: هُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٗ لِّلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤۡتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ يُوقِنُونَ
ayah_translit: alladhina yuqimuna al-salata wayu'tuna al-zakata wahum bil-akhirati hum yuqinuna
ayah_english: Those who establish the prayer and give zakah and they in the Hereafter [they] believe firmly

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ عَلَىٰ هُدٗى مِّن رَّبِّهِمۡۖ وَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ
ayah_translit: ulaika ala hudan min rabbihim wa-ulaika humu al-muf'lihuna
ayah_english: Those (are) on guidance from their Lord and those [they] (are) the successful

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ عَلَىٰ هُدٗى مِّن رَّبِّهِمۡۖ وَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ

ayah: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَشۡتَرِي لَهۡوَ ٱلۡحَدِيثِ لِيُضِلَّ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ بِغَيۡرِ عِلۡمٖ وَيَتَّخِذَهَا هُزُوًاۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ مُّهِينٞ
ayah_translit: wamina al-nasi man yashtari lahwa al-hadithi liyudilla an sabili al-lahi bighayri il'min wayattakhidhaha huzuwan ulaika lahum adhabun muhinun
ayah_english: And of the mankind (is he) who purchases idle tales idle tales to mislead from (the) path (of) Allah without knowledge and takes it (in) ridicule Those for them (is) a punishment humiliating

ayah: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَشۡتَرِي لَهۡوَ ٱلۡحَدِيثِ لِيُضِلَّ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ بِغَيۡرِ عِلۡمٖ وَيَتَّخِذَهَا هُزُوًاۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ مُّهِينٞ

ayah_english: And of the mankind (is he) who purchases idle tales idle tales to mislead from (the) path (of) Allah without knowledge and takes it (in) ridicule Those for them (is) a punishment humiliating

ayah: وَإِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا وَلَّىٰ مُسۡتَكۡبِرٗا كَأَن لَّمۡ يَسۡمَعۡهَا كَأَنَّ فِيٓ أُذُنَيۡهِ وَقۡرٗاۖ فَبَشِّرۡهُ بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
ayah_translit: wa-idha tut'la alayhi ayatuna walla mus'takbiran ka-an lam yasma'ha ka-anna fi udhunayhi waqran fabashir'hu bi'adhabin alimin
ayah_english: And when are recited to him Our Verses he turns away arrogantly as if not he (had) heard them as if in his ears (is) deafness So give him tidings of a punishment painful

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ جَنَّـٰتُ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
ayah_translit: inna alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati lahum jannatu al-na'imi
ayah_english: Indeed those who believe and do righteous deeds for them (are) Gardens (of) Delight

ayah: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٗاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
ayah_translit: khalidina fiha wa'da al-lahi haqqan wahuwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
ayah_english: (To) abide forever in it (The) Promise of Allah (The) Promise of Allah (is) true And He (is) the All-Mighty the All-Wise

ayah: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٗاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
ayah_translit: khalidina fiha wa'da al-lahi haqqan wahuwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
ayah_english: (To) abide forever in it (The) Promise of Allah (The) Promise of Allah (is) true And He (is) the All-Mighty the All-Wise

ayah: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٗاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
ayah_translit: khalidina fiha wa'da al-lahi haqqan wahuwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
ayah_english: (To) abide forever in it (The) Promise of Allah (The) Promise of Allah (is) true And He (is) the All-Mighty the All-Wise

ayah: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٗاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
ayah_translit: khalidina fiha wa'da al-lahi haqqan wahuwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
ayah_english: (To) abide forever in it (The) Promise of Allah (The) Promise of Allah (is) true And He (is) the All-Mighty the All-Wise

ayah: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ بِغَيۡرِ عَمَدٖ تَرَوۡنَهَاۖ وَأَلۡقَىٰ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَوَٰسِيَ أَن تَمِيدَ بِكُمۡ وَبَثَّ فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ دَآبَّةٖۚ وَأَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَأَنۢبَتۡنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوۡجٖ كَرِيمٍ
ayah_translit: khalaqa al-samawati bighayri amadin tarawnaha wa-alqa fi al-ardi rawasiya an tamida bikum wabatha fiha min kulli dabbatin wa-anzalna mina al-samai maan fa-anbatna fiha min kulli zawjin karimin
ayah_english: He created the heavens without pillars that you see and has cast in the earth firm mountains lest it (might) shake with you and He dispersed in it from every creature And We sent down from the sky water then We caused to grow therein of every kind noble

ayah: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ بِغَيۡرِ عَمَدٖ تَرَوۡنَهَاۖ وَأَلۡقَىٰ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَوَٰسِيَ أَن تَمِيدَ بِكُمۡ وَبَثَّ فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ دَآبَّةٖۚ وَأَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَأَنۢبَتۡنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوۡجٖ كَرِيمٍ

ayah_translit: khalaqa al-samawati bighayri amadin tarawnaha wa-alqa fi al-ardi rawasiya an tamida bikum wabatha fiha min kulli dabbatin wa-anzalna mina al-samai maan fa-anbatna fiha min kulli zawjin karimin

ayah: هَٰذَا خَلۡقُ ٱللَّهِ فَأَرُونِي مَاذَا خَلَقَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦۚ بَلِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
ayah_translit: hadha khalqu al-lahi fa-aruni madha khalaqa alladhina min dunihi bali al-zalimuna fi dalalin mubinin
ayah_english: This (is the) creation (of) Allah So show Me what have created those besides Him besides Him Nay the wrongdoers (are) in error clear

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا لُقۡمَٰنَ ٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ أَنِ ٱشۡكُرۡ لِلَّهِۚ وَمَن يَشۡكُرۡ فَإِنَّمَا يَشۡكُرُ لِنَفۡسِهِۦۖ وَمَن كَفَرَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَنِيٌّ حَمِيدٞ
ayah_translit: walaqad atayna luq'mana al-hik'mata ani ush'kur lillahi waman yashkur fa-innama yashkuru linafsihi waman kafara fa-inna al-laha ghaniyyun hamidun
ayah_english: And verily We gave Luqman the wisdom that Be grateful to Allah And whoever (is) grateful then only he is grateful for himself And whoever (is) ungrateful then indeed Allah (is) Free of need Praiseworthy

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا لُقۡمَٰنَ ٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ أَنِ ٱشۡكُرۡ لِلَّهِۚ وَمَن يَشۡكُرۡ فَإِنَّمَا يَشۡكُرُ لِنَفۡسِهِۦۖ وَمَن كَفَرَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَنِيٌّ حَمِيدٞ

ayah_translit: walaqad atayna luq'mana al-hik'mata ani ush'kur lillahi waman yashkur fa-innama yashkuru linafsihi waman kafara fa-inna al-laha ghaniyyun hamidun
ayah_english: And verily We gave Luqman the wisdom that Be grateful to Allah And whoever (is) grateful then only he is grateful for himself And whoever (is) ungrateful then indeed Allah (is) Free of need Praiseworthy

ayah: وَإِذۡ قَالَ لُقۡمَٰنُ لِٱبۡنِهِۦ وَهُوَ يَعِظُهُۥ يَٰبُنَيَّ لَا تُشۡرِكۡ بِٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّ ٱلشِّرۡكَ لَظُلۡمٌ عَظِيمٞ
ayah_translit: wa-idh qala luq'manu li-ib'nihi wahuwa ya'izuhu yabunayya la tush'rik bil-lahi inna al-shir'ka lazul'mun azimun
ayah_english: And when said Luqman to his son while he (was) instructing him O my son! (Do) not associate partners with Allah Indeed associating partners (is) surely an injustice great

ayah: وَإِذۡ قَالَ لُقۡمَٰنُ لِٱبۡنِهِۦ وَهُوَ يَعِظُهُۥ يَٰبُنَيَّ لَا تُشۡرِكۡ بِٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّ ٱلشِّرۡكَ لَظُلۡمٌ عَظِيمٞ

ayah_translit: wa-idh qala luq'manu li-ib'nihi wahuwa ya'izuhu yabunayya la tush'rik bil-lahi inna al-shir'ka lazul'mun azimun
ayah_english: And when said Luqman to his son while he (was) instructing him O my son! (Do) not associate partners with Allah Indeed associating partners (is) surely an injustice great

ayah: وَوَصَّيۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ حَمَلَتۡهُ أُمُّهُۥ وَهۡنًا عَلَىٰ وَهۡنٖ وَفِصَٰلُهُۥ فِي عَامَيۡنِ أَنِ ٱشۡكُرۡ لِي وَلِوَٰلِدَيۡكَ إِلَيَّ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
ayah_translit: wawassayna al-insana biwalidayhi hamalathu ummuhu wahnan ala wahnin wafisaluhu fi amayni ani ush'kur li waliwalidayka ilayya al-masiru
ayah_english: And We have enjoined (upon) man for his parents carried him his mother (in) weakness upon weakness and his weaning (is) in two years that Be grateful to Me and to your parents towards Me (is) the destination

ayah: وَإِن جَٰهَدَاكَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن تُشۡرِكَ بِي مَا لَيۡسَ لَكَ بِهِۦ عِلۡمٞ فَلَا تُطِعۡهُمَاۖ وَصَاحِبۡهُمَا فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا مَعۡرُوفٗاۖ وَٱتَّبِعۡ سَبِيلَ مَنۡ أَنَابَ إِلَيَّۚ ثُمَّ إِلَيَّ مَرۡجِعُكُمۡ فَأُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-in jahadaka ala an tush'rika bi ma laysa laka bihi il'mun fala tuti'huma wasahib'huma fi al-dun'ya ma'rufan wa-ittabi' sabila man anaba ilayya thumma ilayya marji'ukum fa-unabbi-ukum bima kuntum ta'maluna
ayah_english: But if they strive against you on that you associate partners with Me what not you have of it any knowledge then (do) not obey both of them But accompany them in the world (with) kindness and follow (the) path (of him) who turns to Me Then towards Me (is) your return then I will inform you of what you used (to) do

ayah: وَإِن جَٰهَدَاكَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن تُشۡرِكَ بِي مَا لَيۡسَ لَكَ بِهِۦ عِلۡمٞ فَلَا تُطِعۡهُمَاۖ وَصَاحِبۡهُمَا فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا مَعۡرُوفٗاۖ وَٱتَّبِعۡ سَبِيلَ مَنۡ أَنَابَ إِلَيَّۚ ثُمَّ إِلَيَّ مَرۡجِعُكُمۡ فَأُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

ayah: وَإِن جَٰهَدَاكَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن تُشۡرِكَ بِي مَا لَيۡسَ لَكَ بِهِۦ عِلۡمٞ فَلَا تُطِعۡهُمَاۖ وَصَاحِبۡهُمَا فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا مَعۡرُوفٗاۖ وَٱتَّبِعۡ سَبِيلَ مَنۡ أَنَابَ إِلَيَّۚ ثُمَّ إِلَيَّ مَرۡجِعُكُمۡ فَأُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

ayah: يَٰبُنَيَّ إِنَّهَآ إِن تَكُ مِثۡقَالَ حَبَّةٖ مِّنۡ خَرۡدَلٖ فَتَكُن فِي صَخۡرَةٍ أَوۡ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ أَوۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَأۡتِ بِهَا ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَطِيفٌ خَبِيرٞ
ayah_translit: yabunayya innaha in taku mith'qala habbatin min khardalin fatakun fi sakhratin aw fi al-samawati aw fi al-ardi yati biha al-lahu inna al-laha latifun khabirun
ayah_english: O my son Indeed it if it be (the) weight (of) a grain of a mustard seed and it be in a rock or in the heavens or in the earth Allah will bring it forth Allah will bring it forth Allah will bring it forth Indeed Allah (is) All-Subtle All-Aware

ayah: يَٰبُنَيَّ إِنَّهَآ إِن تَكُ مِثۡقَالَ حَبَّةٖ مِّنۡ خَرۡدَلٖ فَتَكُن فِي صَخۡرَةٍ أَوۡ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ أَوۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَأۡتِ بِهَا ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَطِيفٌ خَبِيرٞ

ayah: يَٰبُنَيَّ أَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَأۡمُرۡ بِٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَٱنۡهَ عَنِ ٱلۡمُنكَرِ وَٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَآ أَصَابَكَۖ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ عَزۡمِ ٱلۡأُمُورِ
ayah_translit: yabunayya aqimi al-salata wamur bil-ma'rufi wa-in'ha ani al-munkari wa-is'bir ala ma asabaka inna dhalika min azmi al-umuri
ayah_english: O my son Establish the prayer and enjoin [with] the right and forbid from the wrong and be patient over what befalls you Indeed that (is) of the matters requiring determination the matters requiring determination

ayah: يَٰبُنَيَّ أَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَأۡمُرۡ بِٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَٱنۡهَ عَنِ ٱلۡمُنكَرِ وَٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَآ أَصَابَكَۖ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ عَزۡمِ ٱلۡأُمُورِ
ayah_translit: yabunayya aqimi al-salata wamur bil-ma'rufi wa-in'ha ani al-munkari wa-is'bir ala ma asabaka inna dhalika min azmi al-umuri

ayah: يَٰبُنَيَّ أَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَأۡمُرۡ بِٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَٱنۡهَ عَنِ ٱلۡمُنكَرِ وَٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَآ أَصَابَكَۖ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ عَزۡمِ ٱلۡأُمُورِ

ayah_english: O my son Establish the prayer and enjoin [with] the right and forbid from the wrong and be patient over what befalls you Indeed that (is) of the matters requiring determination the matters requiring determination

ayah: وَلَا تُصَعِّرۡ خَدَّكَ لِلنَّاسِ وَلَا تَمۡشِ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مَرَحًاۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ مُخۡتَالٖ فَخُورٖ
ayah_translit: wala tusa'ir khaddaka lilnnasi wala tamshi fi al-ardi marahan inna al-laha la yuhibbu kulla mukh'talin fakhurin
ayah_english: And (do) not turn your cheek from men and (do) not walk in the earth exultantly Indeed Allah (does) not like every self-conceited boaster

ayah: وَلَا تُصَعِّرۡ خَدَّكَ لِلنَّاسِ وَلَا تَمۡشِ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مَرَحًاۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ مُخۡتَالٖ فَخُورٖ

ayah: وَٱقۡصِدۡ فِي مَشۡيِكَ وَٱغۡضُضۡ مِن صَوۡتِكَۚ إِنَّ أَنكَرَ ٱلۡأَصۡوَٰتِ لَصَوۡتُ ٱلۡحَمِيرِ
ayah_translit: wa-iq'sid fi mashyika wa-ugh'dud min sawtika inna ankara al-aswati lasawtu al-hamiri
ayah_english: And be moderate in your pace and lower [of] your voice Indeed (the) harshest (of all) sounds (is) surely (the) voice (of) the donkeys

ayah: وَٱقۡصِدۡ فِي مَشۡيِكَ وَٱغۡضُضۡ مِن صَوۡتِكَۚ إِنَّ أَنكَرَ ٱلۡأَصۡوَٰتِ لَصَوۡتُ ٱلۡحَمِيرِ

ayah: أَلَمۡ تَرَوۡاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَخَّرَ لَكُم مَّا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَأَسۡبَغَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ نِعَمَهُۥ ظَٰهِرَةٗ وَبَاطِنَةٗۗ وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يُجَٰدِلُ فِي ٱللَّهِ بِغَيۡرِ عِلۡمٖ وَلَا هُدٗى وَلَا كِتَٰبٖ مُّنِيرٖ
ayah_translit: alam taraw anna al-laha sakhara lakum ma fi al-samawati wama fi al-ardi wa-asbagha alaykum ni'amahu zahiratan wabatinatan wamina al-nasi man yujadilu fi al-lahi bighayri il'min wala hudan wala kitabin munirin
ayah_english: Do not you see that Allah has subjected to you whatever (is) in the heavens and whatever (is) in the earth and amply bestowed upon you His Bounties apparent and hidden But of the people (is he) who disputes about Allah without knowledge and not guidance and not a book enlightening

ayah: أَلَمۡ تَرَوۡاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَخَّرَ لَكُم مَّا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَأَسۡبَغَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ نِعَمَهُۥ ظَٰهِرَةٗ وَبَاطِنَةٗۗ وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يُجَٰدِلُ فِي ٱللَّهِ بِغَيۡرِ عِلۡمٖ وَلَا هُدٗى وَلَا كِتَٰبٖ مُّنِيرٖ
ayah_translit: alam taraw anna al-laha sakhara lakum ma fi al-samawati wama fi al-ardi wa-asbagha alaykum ni'amahu zahiratan wabatinatan wamina al-nasi man yujadilu fi al-lahi bighayri il'min wala hudan wala kitabin munirin

ayah: أَلَمۡ تَرَوۡاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَخَّرَ لَكُم مَّا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَأَسۡبَغَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ نِعَمَهُۥ ظَٰهِرَةٗ وَبَاطِنَةٗۗ وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يُجَٰدِلُ فِي ٱللَّهِ بِغَيۡرِ عِلۡمٖ وَلَا هُدٗى وَلَا كِتَٰبٖ مُّنِيرٖ

ayah: أَلَمۡ تَرَوۡاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَخَّرَ لَكُم مَّا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَأَسۡبَغَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ نِعَمَهُۥ ظَٰهِرَةٗ وَبَاطِنَةٗۗ وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يُجَٰدِلُ فِي ٱللَّهِ بِغَيۡرِ عِلۡمٖ وَلَا هُدٗى وَلَا كِتَٰبٖ مُّنِيرٖ

ayah: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱتَّبِعُواْ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ قَالُواْ بَلۡ نَتَّبِعُ مَا وَجَدۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ ءَابَآءَنَآۚ أَوَلَوۡ كَانَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ يَدۡعُوهُمۡ إِلَىٰ عَذَابِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
ayah_translit: wa-idha qila lahumu ittabi'u ma anzala al-lahu qalu bal nattabi'u ma wajadna alayhi abaana awalaw kana al-shaytanu yad'uhum ila adhabi al-sa'iri
ayah_english: And when it is said to them Follow what Allah (has) revealed Allah (has) revealed they say Nay we will follow what we found on it our forefathers Even if Shaitaan was Shaitaan was (to) call them to (the) punishment (of) the Blaze

ayah: ۞وَمَن يُسۡلِمۡ وَجۡهَهُۥٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَهُوَ مُحۡسِنٞ فَقَدِ ٱسۡتَمۡسَكَ بِٱلۡعُرۡوَةِ ٱلۡوُثۡقَىٰۗ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡأُمُورِ
ayah_translit: waman yus'lim wajhahu ila al-lahi wahuwa muh'sinun faqadi is'tamsaka bil-'ur'wati al-wuth'qa wa-ila al-lahi aqibatu al-umuri
ayah_english: And whoever submits his face to Allah while he (is) a good- doer then indeed he has grasped the handhold the most trustworthy And to Allah (is the) end (of) the matters

ayah: ۞وَمَن يُسۡلِمۡ وَجۡهَهُۥٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَهُوَ مُحۡسِنٞ فَقَدِ ٱسۡتَمۡسَكَ بِٱلۡعُرۡوَةِ ٱلۡوُثۡقَىٰۗ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡأُمُورِ

ayah: ۞وَمَن يُسۡلِمۡ وَجۡهَهُۥٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَهُوَ مُحۡسِنٞ فَقَدِ ٱسۡتَمۡسَكَ بِٱلۡعُرۡوَةِ ٱلۡوُثۡقَىٰۗ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡأُمُورِ

ayah: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُۚ قُلِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِۚ بَلۡ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda layaqulunna al-lahu quli al-hamdu lillahi bal aktharuhum la ya'lamuna
ayah_english: And if you ask them Who created the heavens and the earth They will surely say Allah Say All praises (are) for Allah But most of them (do) not know

ayah: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُۚ قُلِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِۚ بَلۡ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

ayah: لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ
ayah_translit: lillahi ma fi al-samawati wal-ardi inna al-laha huwa al-ghaniyu al-hamidu
ayah_english: To Allah (belongs) whatever (is) in the heavens and the earth Indeed Allah He (is) Free of need the Praiseworthy

ayah: لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ

ayah_translit: lillahi ma fi al-samawati wal-ardi inna al-laha huwa al-ghaniyu al-hamidu
ayah_english: To Allah (belongs) whatever (is) in the heavens and the earth Indeed Allah He (is) Free of need the Praiseworthy

ayah: وَلَوۡ أَنَّمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِن شَجَرَةٍ أَقۡلَٰمٞ وَٱلۡبَحۡرُ يَمُدُّهُۥ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ سَبۡعَةُ أَبۡحُرٖ مَّا نَفِدَتۡ كَلِمَٰتُ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٞ
ayah_translit: walaw annama fi al-ardi min shajaratin aqlamun wal-bahru yamudduhu min ba'dihi sab'atu abhurin ma nafidat kalimatu al-lahi inna al-laha azizun hakimun
ayah_english: And if whatever (is) in the earth of (the) trees (were) pens and the sea (to) add to it after it after it seven seas not would be exhausted (the) Words (of) Allah Indeed Allah (is) All-Mighty All-Wise

ayah: وَلَوۡ أَنَّمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِن شَجَرَةٍ أَقۡلَٰمٞ وَٱلۡبَحۡرُ يَمُدُّهُۥ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ سَبۡعَةُ أَبۡحُرٖ مَّا نَفِدَتۡ كَلِمَٰتُ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٞ

ayah: وَلَوۡ أَنَّمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِن شَجَرَةٍ أَقۡلَٰمٞ وَٱلۡبَحۡرُ يَمُدُّهُۥ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ سَبۡعَةُ أَبۡحُرٖ مَّا نَفِدَتۡ كَلِمَٰتُ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٞ

ayah_english: And if whatever (is) in the earth of (the) trees (were) pens and the sea (to) add to it after it after it seven seas not would be exhausted (the) Words (of) Allah Indeed Allah (is) All-Mighty All-Wise

ayah: مَّا خَلۡقُكُمۡ وَلَا بَعۡثُكُمۡ إِلَّا كَنَفۡسٖ وَٰحِدَةٍۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعُۢ بَصِيرٌ
ayah_translit: ma khalqukum wala ba'thukum illa kanafsin wahidatin inna al-laha sami'un basirun
ayah_english: Not (is) your creation and not your resurrection but as a soul single Indeed Allah (is) All-Hearer All-Seer

ayah: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُولِجُ ٱلَّيۡلَ فِي ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فِي ٱلَّيۡلِ وَسَخَّرَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ وَٱلۡقَمَرَۖ كُلّٞ يَجۡرِيٓ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمّٗى وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٞ
ayah_translit: alam tara anna al-laha yuliju al-layla fi al-nahari wayuliju al-nahara fi al-layli wasakhara al-shamsa wal-qamara kullun yajri ila ajalin musamman wa-anna al-laha bima ta'maluna khabirun
ayah_english: Do not you see that Allah causes to enter the night into the day and causes to enter the day into the night and has subjected the sun and the moon each moving for a term appointed and that Allah of what you do (is) All-Aware

ayah: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُولِجُ ٱلَّيۡلَ فِي ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فِي ٱلَّيۡلِ وَسَخَّرَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ وَٱلۡقَمَرَۖ كُلّٞ يَجۡرِيٓ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمّٗى وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٞ

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَأَنَّ مَا يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيُّ ٱلۡكَبِيرُ
ayah_translit: dhalika bi-anna al-laha huwa al-haqu wa-anna ma yad'una min dunihi al-batilu wa-anna al-laha huwa al-'aliyu al-kabiru
ayah_english: That (is) because Allah He (is) the Truth and that what they call besides Him besides Him (is) [the] falsehood and that Allah He (is) the Most High the Most Great

ayah: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱلۡفُلۡكَ تَجۡرِي فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ بِنِعۡمَتِ ٱللَّهِ لِيُرِيَكُم مِّنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّكُلِّ صَبَّارٖ شَكُورٖ
ayah_translit: alam tara anna al-ful'ka tajri fi al-bahri bini'mati al-lahi liyuriyakum min ayatihi inna fi dhalika laayatin likulli sabbarin shakurin
ayah_english: Do not you see that the ships sail through the sea by (the) Grace (of) Allah that He may show you of His Signs Indeed in that surely (are) Signs for everyone (who is) patient grateful

ayah_translit: alam tara anna al-ful'ka tajri fi al-bahri bini'mati al-lahi liyuriyakum min ayatihi inna fi dhalika laayatin likulli sabbarin shakurin
ayah_english: Do not you see that the ships sail through the sea by (the) Grace (of) Allah that He may show you of His Signs Indeed in that surely (are) Signs for everyone (who is) patient grateful

ayah: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱلۡفُلۡكَ تَجۡرِي فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ بِنِعۡمَتِ ٱللَّهِ لِيُرِيَكُم مِّنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّكُلِّ صَبَّارٖ شَكُورٖ

ayah: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱلۡفُلۡكَ تَجۡرِي فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ بِنِعۡمَتِ ٱللَّهِ لِيُرِيَكُم مِّنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّكُلِّ صَبَّارٖ شَكُورٖ

ayah: وَإِذَا غَشِيَهُم مَّوۡجٞ كَٱلظُّلَلِ دَعَوُاْ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ فَلَمَّا نَجَّىٰهُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡبَرِّ فَمِنۡهُم مُّقۡتَصِدٞۚ وَمَا يَجۡحَدُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ إِلَّا كُلُّ خَتَّارٖ كَفُورٖ
ayah_translit: wa-idha ghashiyahum mawjun kal-zulali da'awu al-laha mukh'lisina lahu al-dina falamma najjahum ila al-bari famin'hum muq'tasidun wama yajhadu biayatina illa kullu khattarin kafurin
ayah_english: And when covers them a wave like canopies they call Allah (being) sincere to Him (in) religion But when He delivers them to the land then among them (some are) moderate And not deny Our Signs except every traitor ungrateful

ayah: وَإِذَا غَشِيَهُم مَّوۡجٞ كَٱلظُّلَلِ دَعَوُاْ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ فَلَمَّا نَجَّىٰهُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡبَرِّ فَمِنۡهُم مُّقۡتَصِدٞۚ وَمَا يَجۡحَدُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ إِلَّا كُلُّ خَتَّارٖ كَفُورٖ

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ ٱتَّقُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ وَٱخۡشَوۡاْ يَوۡمٗا لَّا يَجۡزِي وَالِدٌ عَن وَلَدِهِۦ وَلَا مَوۡلُودٌ هُوَ جَازٍ عَن وَالِدِهِۦ شَيۡـًٔاۚ إِنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞۖ فَلَا تَغُرَّنَّكُمُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَلَا يَغُرَّنَّكُم بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡغَرُورُ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha al-nasu ittaqu rabbakum wa-ikh'shaw yawman la yajzi walidun an waladihi wala mawludun huwa jazin an walidihi shayan inna wa'da al-lahi haqqun fala taghurrannakumu al-hayatu al-dun'ya wala yaghurrannakum bil-lahi al-gharuru
ayah_english: O mankind Fear your Lord and fear a Day not can avail a father [for] his son and not a son he (can) avail [for] his father anything Indeed (the) Promise (of) Allah (is) True so let not deceive you so let not deceive you the life (of) the world and let not deceive you and let not deceive you about Allah the deceiver

ayah_translit: yaayyuha al-nasu ittaqu rabbakum wa-ikh'shaw yawman la yajzi walidun an waladihi wala mawludun huwa jazin an walidihi shayan inna wa'da al-lahi haqqun fala taghurrannakumu al-hayatu al-dun'ya wala yaghurrannakum bil-lahi al-gharuru

ayah_english: O mankind Fear your Lord and fear a Day not can avail a father [for] his son and not a son he (can) avail [for] his father anything Indeed (the) Promise (of) Allah (is) True so let not deceive you so let not deceive you the life (of) the world and let not deceive you and let not deceive you about Allah the deceiver

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ ٱتَّقُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ وَٱخۡشَوۡاْ يَوۡمٗا لَّا يَجۡزِي وَالِدٌ عَن وَلَدِهِۦ وَلَا مَوۡلُودٌ هُوَ جَازٍ عَن وَالِدِهِۦ شَيۡـًٔاۚ إِنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞۖ فَلَا تَغُرَّنَّكُمُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَلَا يَغُرَّنَّكُم بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡغَرُورُ

ayah_english: O mankind Fear your Lord and fear a Day not can avail a father [for] his son and not a son he (can) avail [for] his father anything Indeed (the) Promise (of) Allah (is) True so let not deceive you so let not deceive you the life (of) the world and let not deceive you and let not deceive you about Allah the deceiver

ayah: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عِندَهُۥ عِلۡمُ ٱلسَّاعَةِ وَيُنَزِّلُ ٱلۡغَيۡثَ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡحَامِۖ وَمَا تَدۡرِي نَفۡسٞ مَّاذَا تَكۡسِبُ غَدٗاۖ وَمَا تَدۡرِي نَفۡسُۢ بِأَيِّ أَرۡضٖ تَمُوتُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ خَبِيرُۢ
ayah_translit: inna al-laha indahu il'mu al-sa'ati wayunazzilu al-ghaytha waya'lamu ma fi al-arhami wama tadri nafsun madha taksibu ghadan wama tadri nafsun bi-ayyi ardin tamutu inna al-laha alimun khabirun
ayah_english: Indeed Allah with Him (is the) knowledge (of) the Hour and He sends down the rain and knows what (is) in the wombs And not knows any soul what it will earn tomorrow and not knows any soul in what land it will die Indeed Allah (is) All-Knower All-Aware

ayah: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عِندَهُۥ عِلۡمُ ٱلسَّاعَةِ وَيُنَزِّلُ ٱلۡغَيۡثَ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡحَامِۖ وَمَا تَدۡرِي نَفۡسٞ مَّاذَا تَكۡسِبُ غَدٗاۖ وَمَا تَدۡرِي نَفۡسُۢ بِأَيِّ أَرۡضٖ تَمُوتُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ خَبِيرُۢ

ayah_translit: inna al-laha indahu il'mu al-sa'ati wayunazzilu al-ghaytha waya'lamu ma fi al-arhami wama tadri nafsun madha taksibu ghadan wama tadri nafsun bi-ayyi ardin tamutu inna al-laha alimun khabirun
ayah_english: Indeed Allah with Him (is the) knowledge (of) the Hour and He sends down the rain and knows what (is) in the wombs And not knows any soul what it will earn tomorrow and not knows any soul in what land it will die Indeed Allah (is) All-Knower All-Aware
